did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine Office of the Dean records, 1997-2003

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine Office of the Dean

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence and subject files compiled by the Office of the Dean of the Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine during Donald Smith's tenure as dean.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Donald F. Smith was appointed Dean of the Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine in 1997.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and subject files compiled by the Office of the Dean of the Cornell University College of Veterinary Medicine during Donald Smith's tenure as dean.
"Self-Study Report of the College of Veterinary Medicine.... to the Council on Education, American Veterinary Medical Association, August, 2003."
